title: WR x September Camp Towel
body_html: In collaboration with SEPTEMBER. Microfiber towels are the perfect keep in the car, or bike bag, do-everything item. Use to brush off dirt and sweat, dry off after a dip in the river/lake, or to cover up while you change in the parking lot. Towels feature our unique seasonal print that we collaborated with SEPTEMBER to create.

featured_image.alt: [WR x September] Green and cream mushroom print quick dry camp towel front side

title: WR x SEPTEMBER Lucky Bottom
body_html: Meet the Lucky Bottom, SEPTEMBER’S best-selling high-waisted bikini bottom designed for ultimate comfort, confidence, and performance. With a flattering high-rise fit and just the right amount of coverage, it moves with you—whether you’re surfing, swimming, or lounging on the sand. No slipping, no adjusting—just a perfect fit, every time.

title: WR x SEPTEMBER Moana Top
body_html: The Moana Bikini Top combines style and function, offering full coverage and a secure fit for all your water adventures. Its pull-over design ensures ease and comfort, while the supportive structure keeps you confident during activities like swimming, surfing, or days spent on the river! Cute and versatile, the Moana Bikini Top is perfect for active days in and out of the water!

title: Ride Fast, Raise Hell Benefit Tee
body_html: We’re re-releasing everyone’s fave graphic on Wild Rye's classic cotton tee to raise money (and hell) for women’s rights. $5 from every shirt sold will be donated to Planned Parenthood. We’ve always shown up for women—and we’re not stopping now. Let’s put our dollars where it matters. The "Ride Fast, Raise Hell" artwork was created in collaboration with artist and pro team rider, KaJay Rooke.

title: Edith Brim Hat
body_html: Meet Wild Rye’s five panel hat. No cheap foam here, just classic styling and playful patches & embroidery make this collection of hats your ideal partner when it comes to hiding helmet hair or just providing protection on a sunny day.

body_html: Everything you already love about the Freel, but in a shorter 7" inseam. Same fabric, same prints, same great side pockets, but a slightly re-tooled fit to accommodate a shorter inseam. All sales are final for this item.

title: Parker Action Dress
body_html: The Parker Active Dress is built for movement but styled for spontaneity. Lightweight, breathable, and quick-drying, she keeps you cool even when summer starts to feel like an oven. No built-in shorts means she’s easy, breezy (and more versatile)—wear ’er to the beach or on a hike or make it your casual brunch ’fit. She’s the kind of dress that doesn’t ask what’s the plan—she just says “hell yes.”

title: Regan Bike Pant
body_html: Made with a light weight, stretchy, and ultra-comfy recycled polyester, the Regan pant has a slightly baggy fit and is built for enhanced breathability and range of motion. The Regan makes pedaling a breeze, descending a dream, and also pulls double duty as a fantastic hiking or climbing pant that's perfect for hotter days that require added protection.

title: Sloane Tee
body_html: Introducing the goldilocks of tees. Not too tight, not too loose; not too long, not too short. The Sloane Tee hits the sweet spot in fit, looks, and price point. Featuring a classic silhouette that’s a bit more relaxed than the Salida, this easy going tee is just what you’re looking for.

title: Parker Skort
body_html: Much like its big sister the Parker Active Dress, the Parker Skort is the base to your cute-as-heck, do-it-all ‘fit. This Skort is your new go-to for a quick hike, bike commute, trail run or trip to the farmers market. It also happens to be perfect for the days when your parents ask you to join them on the pickleball court.

This will be your do-anything, go-anywhere technical tee that doesn't seem to scream "I'm here to work out".

title: Pungo Cap
body_html: Sweat in it, stash it in your pocket; smash it into your pack. The Pungo Cap is the perfect lightweight companion for high-output adventures.

title: Smith Bobcat
body_html: Enduro trail riding to gravel adventure or backcountry powder mission, the Smith Bobcat sunglasses are for riders and skiers who want the full coverage of the Wildcat with a smaller fit and a lightweight feel. This hybrid design pairs goggle-like coverage with the airflow and easy-wear feel of sunglasses. ChromaPop™ brings out the details on forested trails and in bright alpine bowls. The lens is interchangeable, and a bonus clear lens is included for low-light needs. No-slip fit details keeps them in place through rocky terrain and high-speed descents.

variants.title: Wild Rye ChromaPop Black / One Size

featured_image.alt: Smith x Wild Rye sunglasses

title: Smith Network Mips®
body_html: You've always been drawn to the challenge of a new route, a new trail, the thrill of the unexpected. Designed for whatever you get into on two wheels, the Smith Network is our versatile, shred-ready bike helmet. Safety techs like KOROYD® and Mips® offer protection and enhanced energy absorption should you need it. When the sun is blazing and you're heating up, the ventilation system keeps air flowing and your eyewear fog-free. Later, when the light dips beneath the hills, store your shades in pass-through channels on the front.

variants.title: Matte Smith X Wild Rye / S

featured_image.alt: Smith x Wild Rye Network Helmet side view

variants.title: Matte Smith X Wild Rye / M

featured_image.alt: Smith x Wild Rye Network Helmet side view

title: Smith Forefront 3 Mips®
body_html: From flowy single track to technical descents, the Smith Forefront 3 Mountain Bike Helmet has your back (and front and sides) more than ever thanks to a complete internal injected roll cage, extended back coverage and a Mips® Safety System that's integrated directly into the helmet padding for more comfort. Add venting that increases airflow by 25 percent, a micro-adjustable BOA® Fit System and complete Koroyd® coverage, and you have a helmet that's as comfortable as it is loaded with cutting-edge design and impact protection. And when you start to sweat as you climb or prepare to drop in on a descent, you can count on the 20 vents plus our AirEvac™ ventilation to keep your sunglasses or goggles fog-free. The visor adjusts for easy goggle storage between laps, and you can slide your sunglasses into the shell for secure storage on the front or back.

body_html: Keep the most important touchpoint on your bike—your hands—happy with the Wild Rye Galena Gel Bike Glove. We’ve been there - you’re tackling a technical line and suddenly you find yourself gripping your handles so hard that your fingers are tingling and your palms are sweating. The Galena was designed from the ground up to keep you cool and protected during those critical moments. With gel padding, wicking materials, ‘Play Wild’ palm gripper detail and fun colors, these gloves will quickly become your favorite bike accessory.

body_html: Microfiber towels are the perfect keep in the car, or bike bag, do-everything item. Use to brush off dirt and sweat, dry off after a dip in the river/lake, or to cover up while you change in the parking lot. This towel features a unique and creative seasonal print.

title: Wild Rye Bike Socks | 6"
body_html: We don’t think about it much, but our feet are the foundation of our ride. That is why we decided it was time to design the perfect bike sock from the ground up. The Wild Rye Bike sock is knit with a nylon, recycled poly (COOLMAX®), lycra blend for the ultimate soft touch and the right balance of stretch and compression. Featuring a 6" cuff to keep dirt and gravel out of your shoes, these high performance, lightweight socks are the perfect partner for your day in the dirt, whether you’re mountain biking, trail running, or hiking.

body_html: Bucket hats aren’t just cool, they’re also functional. The brand new Bucky Hat checks all the boxes when you’re looking for a stylish way to keep the sun at bay. Whether you’re booting up a steep couloir or waiting for waves in the lineup, the Bucky has you covered.

title: Billie Stash Bib
body_html: We're carrying over the same high end fabric you already love from our chammies, but adding the extra security of mesh over the shoulder straps to hold everything in place. Thoughtfully designed paneling and mesh placements are tailored perfectly for a woman's body while still maintaining movement and breathability. We’ve leveled up our bibs this season by adding stash pockets on both legs for easy access to your phone, ID, and ALL of the snacks.

title: Salida bike Jersey | Past Season
body_html: The Salida is the evolution of our OG Sandia jersey. With updated shape and fabric, the Salida features a more relaxed fit for a wider range of outdoor adventures. A new durable and stink resistant merino blend fabric covers the front of the jersey, while the back features breathable mesh paneling. The UPF 50 fabric gives you protection from the sun and reduces your sunscreen use. A perfect adventure shirt that takes you from your front door to the top of your personal "front range," whether that's a mountain top or paved trail. All sales are final for this item.

title: Bidon Water Bottle
body_html: Staying hydrated shouldn't feel like a chore, so we've designed a set of bottles inspired by our seasonal prints. Our Bidon's feature Purist technology that shields the inside of the bottle from any bad taste, mold or staining. As pure as drinking from a glass, but with the advantage of a flexible bottle. Designed and made in the USA.

title: Skida x Wild Rye | Alpine Headband
body_html: Sharing a passion for technical and beautiful outdoor apparel, we teamed up with the ladies behind Skida to bring you new patterns of your go-to cold weather head and neckwear. The fleece-lined Alpine Headband brings an extra barrier of warmth. Printed with our Retro Riptide pattern, this poly-blend fabric is lined with soft Polartec® micro-fleece, a combination that wicks moisture and keeps your warm and dry.

title: Skida x Wild Rye | Brim Hat
body_html: Sharing a passion for technical and beautiful outdoor apparel, we teamed up with the ladies behind Skida to bring you new patterns of your go-to head and neckwear. The Brim Hat is the perfect grab-and-go companion for sunny days or snowy ski tours: it's lightweight, packable, and quick-drying. Available in Wild Rye's Retro Riptide print.

title: Skida x Wild Rye | Alpine Balaclava
body_html: Sharing a passion for technical and beautiful outdoor apparel, we teamed up with the ladies behind Skida to bring you new patterns of your go-to cold weather head and neckwear. The Balaclava offers full neck and head coverage for long days outdoors. Inspired by deep turns and frigid powder days, this is a product that can keep up and dry quickly. The sleek design made with Skida's signature breathable fabric is the ultimate combination of warmth and function. The hood fits seamlessly under a hat, helmet, or around the neck when not in use.

title: Skida x Wild Rye | Alpine Neckwarmer
body_html: Sharing a passion for technical and beautiful outdoor apparel, we teamed up with the ladies behind Skida to bring you new patterns of your go-to cold weather head and neckwear. The Alpine Neckwarmer keeps everything from your neck to your nose toasty and warm on frigid days. The Retro Riptide printed poly-blend fabric wicks away moisture, leaving the Polartec® micro-fleece lining dry and soft against your face. It is the perfect solution for battling cold conditions.

title: Skida x Wild Rye | Alpine Hat
body_html:
Sharing a passion for technical and beautiful outdoor apparel, we teamed up with the ladies behind Skida to bring you new patterns of your go-to cold weather head and neckwear. The Alpine Hat is the perfect weight for colder days. Lined with cozy mid-weight fleece - it wicks moisture, cuts wind, and always leaves you high and dry. Great for chilly runs, hitting the slopes, or just cruising around town. This hat goes from casual to performance without skipping a beat.

Sizing: S/M- 20.5” Circumference

title: FBNL Camas
body_html: The women are going to Red Bull Rampage this year, and that’s not the first ceiling to be shattered! Whether in sports, politics, or business and leadership, this limited run of the ultra-cozy Camas Crew celebrates all of the "firsts" and reminds us that once ceilings are shattered, new heights can be reached. We recommend sizing up for the intended oversized look. 25% of the proceeds will be donated to Planned Parenthood.

title: Change Maker Tee
body_html: In collaboration with artist Kika Macfarlane, we're bringing to life a collection of graphic tees that highlight some of Wild Rye's core beliefs. With Kika's iconic bold designs, we aim to inspire a sense of joy and possibility, reflecting our commitment to empowering individuals and celebrating the beauty of the outdoors. This collection isn’t just about style – it’s about spreading good energy and looking forward to a brighter, more optimistic world.

title: Olivia Onesie
body_html:
Eliminate the gap on powder days or hunker down in your perfect cozy head-to-toe merino layer for all around warmth and perfect temperature regulation on and off the hill. And, for those who don't love getting fully nude to use the restroom (whether indoors or adventuring in the snow), we've created the ultimate convenience: the butt zip. An often overlooked feature for those who don't pee standing up, this zipper allows for quick and easy relief. This is the last season of the Olivia onesie, so get her while you can!

The circumferential zipper featured on the Olivia Onesie and referenced as the ‘Butt Zipp’ is used while this product and the “Butt Zipp” mark are phased out by Wild Rye.  Airblaster LLC owns and reserves all rights in and to the ‘Hip Zip’ trademark and associated rights

body_html: We’re excited to team up with All Bikes Welcome and artist Paige Dirksen to bring you a selection of products that blend stunning artwork and support for an incredible organization. This block print inspired bandana provides flair on and off the bike! A portion of the proceeds from these products will be donated to All Bikes Welcome, contributing to their mission of building more racial equity and gender diversity in cycling in the Northwest Arkansas corridor.

title: Camas Crew
body_html: The perfect crewneck she can toss on over any outfit—jeans, leggings, jorts, a dress, you name it—and still feel put-together. We're not saying it hasn't been done before, we're just saying we might have done it better. The new Camas Crew is for the days where you want to rep Wild Rye while casually sipping a latté at your favorite coffee shop. We recommend sizing up for the intended oversized look.

title: Freel Bike Short | Past Season
body_html:
Our flagship short, the Freel has been Outside Magazine’s Gear of the Year and is beloved by mountain bikers everywhere, from the Alps to the Bitterroots. Made with shrub-resistant and mud-deflecting nylon, the Freel is an enduro ready short that seamlessly takes you from the red rocks of Moab to the loamy single track of the PNW. With four-way stretch, deep pockets, a reinforced waistband to combat stretching over time and our unique collection of playful prints, the Freel is a beautifully designed short that’s still technical as hell. No compromises, it’s our favorite workhorse. All sales are final for this item. 

AVAILABLE IN SIZES: 0-18. Size up if in between sizes. 

*Looking for more sizes? Check out our Freel FLEX!

A perfect go anywhere, do anything top, the Merritt is made with a super soft sustainable tencel/poly blend that wicks and dries, all while being wrinkle free. You’ll love the way it pairs with our shorts, but we wouldn’t be surprised if you start rocking it with your favorite pair of jeans too! All sales are final for this item.

title: Wild Rye Bike Socks | 6"
body_html: We don’t think about it much, but our feet are the foundation of our ride. That is why we decided it was time to design the perfect bike sock from the ground up. The new Wild Rye Bike sock is knit with a nylon / recycled poly (COOLMAX®) / lycra blend for the ultimate soft touch and the right balance of stretch and compression. Featuring a 6" cuff to keep dirt and gravel out of your shoes, these high performance, lightweight socks are the perfect partner for your day in the dirt, whether you’re mountain biking, trail running, or hiking.

body_html: Keep the most important touchpoint on your bike—your hands—happy with the Wild Rye Galena Gel Bike Glove. We’ve been there - you’re tackling a technical line and suddenly you find yourself gripping your handles so hard that your fingers are tingling and your palms are sweating. The Galena was designed from the ground up to keep you cool and protected during those critical moments. With gel padding, wicking materials, #PlayWild palm gripper detail and fun, new prints & colors, these gloves will quickly become your favorite bike accessory.

title: Skida x Wild Rye | Bandana
body_html:
Sharing a passion for technical and beautiful outdoor apparel, we teamed up with the ladies behind Skida, a Vermont-based accessories company to bring you your new go-to cold weather head and neckwear.

Skida's Bandana in our Black Lily print was designed to increase your style points on the mountain, while fighting the elements. It also happens to be our favorite furry friend accessory!

The outer Polytwill fabric is highly resistant to snow and sleet, while the inside is insulated with microfleece to keep you warm and protected. For quick layering, the velcro closure of the Bandana makes it an easy piece to throw on and take off, without pulling off your hat or helmet.

The Bandana is great for you AND for your K9 companion.

title: Olivia Onesie - Past Season
body_html:
Eliminate the gap on powder days or hunker down in your perfect cozy head-to-toe merino layer for all around warmth and perfect temperature regulation on and off the hill. And, for those who don't love getting fully nude to use the restroom (whether indoors or adventuring in the snow), we've created the ultimate convenience: the butt zip. An often overlooked feature for those who don't pee standing up, this zipper allows for quick and easy access. A 7/8 length leg ensures no bunching under your boots. 

The circumferential zipper featured on the Olivia Onesie and referenced as the ‘Butt Zipp’ is used while this product and the “Butt Zipp” mark are phased out by Wild Rye.  Airblaster LLC owns and reserves all rights in and to the ‘Hip Zip’ trademark and associated rights

title: Holly Jersey | Past Season
body_html: Meet the Holly Jersey— the long-coveted looser, more enduro/bike park-style jersey. She's a merino/poly blend for a mix of odor resistance and strength with mesh paneling along the sides for breathability. The Holly has a loose fit, with ample room for elbow pads and other body protection, but with a clean silhouette for more casual pedaling. The Holly, like all tops in the Wild Rye line, is designed for versatility with minimal branding to take you from cool fall pedals to the warm bike park days... hiking, trail running, you name it. All sales are final for this item.

title: Juliana x Wild Rye | Freel Bike Short
body_html:
Our flagship short, the Freel has been Outside Magazine’s Gear of the Year and is beloved by mountain bikers everywhere, from the Alps to the Bitterroots. Made with shrub-resistant and mud-deflecting nylon, the Freel is an enduro ready short that seamlessly takes you from the red rocks of Moab to the loamy single track of the PNW. With four-way stretch, deep pockets, and our unique Juliana Bicycles collab fern print, the Freel is a beautifully designed short that’s still technical as hell. No compromises, it’s our favorite workhorse. All sales are final for this item. 

AVAILABLE IN SIZES: 0-18

*NEW! As of Spring '23 the hem of the Freel has been changed to match the Freda - eliminating the hem roll that occurred on some of our Freel shorts! This will not change the fit or length of the shorts.

title: Sandia Bike Jersey
body_html: Some days, it’s hard to get out for an all-day mission, so whether it’s a lunch ride or a post-work power hour, the Sandia LS makes it a breeze to get out and go. Designed with traditional cycling plackets, the Sandia allows you to grab what you need and stash it with ease. The 50 UPF sun protection and carefully placed mesh and wicking panels also ensure you won’t need to waste time applying sunscreen or worrying about your layering game. We love a product that gets you outside faster, and the Sandia LS is here to help, whether you’re heading out on the bike, or just hiking up to catch the sunset. AVAILABLE IN SIZES: 0-18

title: Nona LITE | Past Season
body_html: The short-sleeve sister to our Evie LITE. The Nona LITE is a do-everything light weight tee (160 gsms) made from a recycled poly/merino/spandex blend fabric. In other words, the same anti-stink and moisture-wicking technology you've come to rely on from Merino but with more stretch, more form fitting, and optimal shape retention.

title: Gnarnia Glove
body_html: Our first cold weather glove will provide comfort and warmth on your winter adventures. From the skin track to cold two-wheeled adventures, the Gnarnia is warm, yet breathable, wind resistant and durable.

title: Holly Jersey
body_html: We've been with the Holly for a few years now and our love is stronger than ever. She's a merino/poly blend for a mix of odor resistance and strength with mesh paneling along the sides for breathability. The Holly has a loose fit, with ample room for elbow pads and other body protection, but with a clean silhouette for more casual pedaling. The Holly, like all tops in the Wild Rye line, is designed for versatility with minimal branding to take you from cool fall pedals to warm bike park days... to hiking, trail running, you name it.
